snippet.title: Six Ages 2: Lights Going Out - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Six Ages 2: Lights Going Out will be coming to Steam and iOS on August 21st! Buy on Steam: http://bit.ly/3MdAu9o  

Taking place after the events of the original Six Ages, its sequel will again challenge players in making difficult choices and fight in turn-based combat to ensure the survival of their clan. While completely stand-alone, players will also be allowed to bring in their save from Six Ages: Ride Like the Wind and carry over some of their choices. 

Developed by A Sharp and published by Kitfox Games.
